LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.AjaxCart.Admin.Menu.MenuName
LocaleResource.Value: Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin
LocaleResource.Value: Nop Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings
LocaleResource.Value: Nop Ajax Cart Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.AjaxCartAvailabilitySettings
LocaleResource.Value: Ajax Cart Availability Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.AjaxCartSelectorsSettings
LocaleResource.Value: Ajax Cart Selectors Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableNopAjaxCart
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Nop Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableNopAjaxCart.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Nop Ajax Cart plugin will be enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableOnMobileDevices
LocaleResource.Value: Enable on mobile devices

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableOnMobileDevices.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Nop Ajax Cart will be available on mobile devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableCartWishlistOnProductPage
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Nop Ajax Cart and Ajax Wishlist on Product Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableCartWishlistOnProductPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the Nop Ajax Cart and Ajax Wishlist functionalities are enabled on product page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableCartWishlistOnCatalogPages
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Nop Ajax Cart and Ajax Wishlist On Pages With Product Boxes

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableCartWishlistOnCatalogPages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the Nop Ajax Cart and Ajax Wishlist functionalities are enabled on pages such as category, manufacturer, recently viewed, recently added, etc. pages.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableProductQuantityTextBox
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Product Quantity Text Box On Pages With Product Boxes

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableProductQuantityTextBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the product quantity text box is enabled for products in product boxes.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.FlyoutCartPanelSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Flyout Shopping Cart Element Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.FlyoutCartPanelSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the flyout shopping cart element. It is used by the Nop Ajax Cart plugin to update the flyout shopping cart after a product has been added to the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.GeneralSettingsTitle
LocaleResource.Value: General Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.MiniProductDetailsViewImageSizeInPixels
LocaleResource.Value: Mini Product Details View Image Size

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.MiniProductDetailsViewImageSizeInPixels.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the image size of the images displayed on the mini product details window (show for multi product variants) (in pixels).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableRelatedProductsInPopup
LocaleResource.Value: Show Related Products In Popup

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableRelatedProductsInPopup.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show related products in the popup after adding product to the cart.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.NumberOfRelatedProductsInPopup
LocaleResource.Value: Number Of Related Products In Popup

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.NumberOfRelatedProductsInPopup.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of Related Products in the popup.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableCrossSellProductsInPopup
LocaleResource.Value: Show Cross Sell Products In Popup

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.EnableCrossSellProductsInPopup.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show cross sell products in the popup after adding product to the cart.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCrossSellProductsInPopup
LocaleResource.Value: Number Of Cross Sell Products In Popup

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCrossSellProductsInPopup.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of Cross Sell Products in the popup.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.PageElementSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Page Element Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.PageElementSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element of the page. This selector should be available on all pages. The Nop Ajax Cart plugin uses this element to add dynamic content to it, like modal dialogs and ajax busy animation.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductAddedToCartImageSizeInPixels
LocaleResource.Value: Product Added To Cart Image Size

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductAddedToCartImageSizeInPixels.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the image size of the image displayed on the product added to cart window.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductAddedToCartPopupSettings
LocaleResource.Value: Product Added To Cart Popup Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductBoxAddToCartButtonSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product Box "Add To Cart" Button Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductBoxAddToCartButtonSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the product box "Add to cart" button. The product box is used for listing products on pages like category page, manufacturer page, home page, etc. It is used by the integration of the Nop Ajax Cart plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductBoxProductItemElementSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product Box Product Item Element Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductBoxProductItemElementSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The product item element within the product box holds the ID of the product. The Ajax Cart need this ID in order to work."

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductPageAddToCartButtonSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product Page "Add To Cart" Button Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ProductPageAddToCartButtonSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the product page "Add to cart" button on the product details page. It is used by the integration of the Nop Ajax Cart plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.WishlistMenuLinkSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Wishlist Menu Link Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.WishlistMenuLinkSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element in the header link, which contains information about the number of items in the wishlist.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.AddToWishlistButtonSelector
LocaleResource.Value: "Add To Wishlist" Button Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.AddToWishlistButtonSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the "Add to wishlist" button on all pages.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ShoppingCartMenuLinkSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Shopping Cart Menu Link Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.ShoppingCartMenuLinkSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element in the header link, which contains information about the number of items in the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.Theme
LocaleResource.Value: Theme

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Settings.Theme.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the theme for the Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Submenus
LocaleResource.Value: Submenu names

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.Admin.Submenus.Settings
LocaleResource.Value: Settings

LocaleResource.Value: Continue Shopping

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.ShoppingCartNotificationBoxQuantity
LocaleResource.Value: Quantity

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.PerUnit
LocaleResource.Value: / per unit

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.WishlistNotificationBoxTitle
LocaleResource.Value: Just Added To Your Wishlist

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxCart.ShoppingCartNotificationBoxViewYourBasket
LocaleResource.Value: View Your Basket

LocaleResource.Value: Add to cart failed due to following errors
